name: Promotions Restrict to Email for Event Espresso
author: Marries van de Hoef

sections.description: This plugin is an extension for the Event Espresso 4 Promotions Addon. It adds an option to the promotion add/edit page where you can enter one or more email addresses. The promotion can then only be applied when one of the email addresses match the primary attendees\’ email address.
sections.installation:
1. Upload to the \”/wp-content/plugins/\” directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \”Plugins\” menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • Now only the primary registrants e-mail address is checked for applicable promotions. This used to be all registrants, but was disabled because of security reasons when used in conjunction with the wp-user integration of event espresso.

1.0

  • Initial release.

short_description: Allows the Event Espresso Promotions Addon to be limited to specific e-mail addresses.
